parameters.name: Dim1
parameters.description: First text value to the left of the symbol

parameters.name: Symbol
parameters.description: Weld symbol name (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Dim2
parameters.description: Text value to the right of the symbol

parameters.name: Symmetric
parameters.description: True puts the symbol above and below the horizontal line

parameters.name: FieldWeld
parameters.description: True puts a flag for field welding

parameters.name: ShowOtherSide
parameters.description: True puts Dim1, Symbol, and Dim2 on the other side of the horizontal line

parameters.name: DashOnTop
parameters.description: True puts the dash line on top

parameters.name: Peripheral
parameters.description: True puts a peripheral symbol

parameters.name: HasProcess
parameters.description: True uses ProcessValue

parameters.name: ProcessValue
parameters.description: Process value if HasProcess is set to True

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertWeldSymbol
description: Creates a weld symbol located at the last edge selection.
signature:
void InsertWeldSymbol( 
   System.String
Dim1
,
   System.String
Symbol
,
   System.String
Dim2
,
   System.Boolean
Symmetric
,
   System.Boolean
FieldWeld
,
   System.Boolean
ShowOtherSide
,
   System.Boolean
DashOnTop
,
   System.Boolean
Peripheral
,
   System.Boolean
HasProcess
,
   System.String
ProcessValue
)

parameters.name: Dim1
parameters.description: First text value to the left of the symbol

parameters.name: Symbol
parameters.description: Weld symbol name (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Dim2
parameters.description: Text value to the right of the symbol

parameters.name: Symmetric
parameters.description: True puts the symbol above and below the horizontal line

parameters.name: FieldWeld
parameters.description: True puts a flag for field welding

parameters.name: ShowOtherSide
parameters.description: True puts Dim1, Symbol, and Dim2 on the other side of the horizontal line

parameters.name: DashOnTop
parameters.description: True puts the dash line on top

parameters.name: Peripheral
parameters.description: True puts a peripheral symbol

parameters.name: HasProcess
parameters.description: True uses ProcessValue

parameters.name: ProcessValue
parameters.description: Process value if HasProcess is set to True

remarks:
Symbol specifies the weld symbol name. You can find a list of weld symbol names in
C:\ProgramData\SolidWorks\SolidWorks 20
nn
\
lang
\
english\gtol.sym
.
The format of Symbol is
<
Standard
-
Type
>
. For example, a JIS seam is
<JWELD-JSM>
, and an ISO seam is
<WELD-JSM>
. You must include the right- and left-angle brackets and separate
Standard
and
Type
with a hyphen.
